newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 6.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Jan 6.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Yemen announces 1997 investment programme worth 81 billion Yemeni riyals.
- Jordanian industrial team visits Iraq to boost cooperation between the two countries.
- Saudi, Egyptian businessmen agree to set up six investment projects in Egypt worth $1 billion.
- National Shipping Company of Saudi Arabia takes delivery of new crude tanker built in Japan.
- Oman, Iran sign agreement to develop trade, industry and investment between them.
- Gulf Arab states spent $902 million on advertising in 1996, study.
